Pig got to his feet with some effort, holding his now much, much bigger belly, with Dag and Otis having been added to his growing mass. His hungry stomach rumbled for more, however, and it would soon be answered as pig stroked and and smelt more delicious steak- lots more! He went to investigate, and saw the Jersey Cows, much, much bigger, hanging out alone in the barn. He needed to get just one away from the rest... and so, Pig devised a plan. He waddled off to the house to get the bait.

A few minutes later, Pig returned, with a plate of warm food. He placed it so that two of the cows would be able to smell it and go for it. And so, they did. Leaving the smallest of the three all alone...

Pig came in through the back door to the barn and jumped the cow, pig's belly pinning him as he took his head into his hungry mouth without any thought. Pig kept up on him, taking more and more of the thick, fatty cow into him, the cow just a bit smaller than pig, but with his added weight, he'd be able to take the other two cows. Pig finished finally by slurping down the cow's tail and patting his belly. "Room for two more," he said with a grin and waddled out of the barn to the other two cows proudly.

He found them stuffing their faces with the food he'd layed out. The bigger one turned to him and started laughing. "Look, even the pig got fatter," he said. Pig didn't wait for any more comments, pouncing him while the biggest was distracted, making quick work of this cow, swallowing him down faster than he had the last cow, leaving just the fattest of the three, who Pig pushed down onto his belly. The cow looked shocked as Pig licked his back and began to take his head in. The cow looked shocked. "W..wait, Pig! Don't," he exclaimed," I can help you! I'll get you more food...," he said. I caught him taking down both of those cow girls the other day, he's been hiding out in the shed to avoid suspicion over how fat he's gotten," the fattest of the cows exclaimed, pleading to the floor for his life. Pig rolled off of him, and stood beside him indignantly, his large belly squirming from the two obese bovines he had recently ingested. As the cow looked up in shock at the fact that he had not been devoured by the gluttonous pig, he got to his feet with some effort, and without speaking made his way to the shed, leaving pig to follow with a watchful eye on what he planned to make course two of his next meal...

The obese cow unlatched the shed to reveal a sleeping dog, several times his old weight- it looked as though he couldn't move even if he had wanted to. Pig took the opportunity and dragged Duke out of the shed, almost instantly shoving his thick legs into his mouth, sucking on them as if he hadn't eaten in hours, though it had really only been about five minutes, but to someone who planned to get as large as Pig did, time was of no consequence. As he got Duke's rotund stomach halfway into his hungry mouth, the dog awoke with a start, flailing about and yelling loudly. "P...pig! Get me out of your mouth now! I'm not food," he exclaimed. But to pig, that was all he would ever be- a meal. And so, the hungry porcine forced his head upwards, guiding the last half of the obese hound into his hungry gut quickly, laying there and stroking his distended belly in pleasure. The last Jersey cow realized this was his opportunity and began to sneak off. Pig, however, would not be made a fool of, and gave a powerful kick to the cow that sent him flying back into the shed, pig using the last of his might to move against the door as he shut it, stopping any attempt of escape by the cow. A few hours later, pig awoke to a growling tummy. "Guess it's time," he said greedily, struggling to get to his feet, his belly dragging against the ground as he pulled the door open to reveal the cow he had saved. He lay in a corner of the shed, shaking, quite frightened as pig came towards him with a gleam of hunger in his eyes. Pig grabbed him in what seemed an impossibly smooth motion and brought him to his mouth, pushing his head in first, and making quick work of him, gulping down bit by flabby bit of the cow.

As pig finished, he heard his stomach still growling for more, realizing that maybe he should lay off the animals for a tiny bit, less someone get too suspicious. He remembered that the farmer and his family were out of town this week, and headed for the house, to feast on the contents of their large refrigerator. As he got there, his stomach was growling even louder than usual. He pushed through the largest window on the house- even this proved a struggle, and moved for the kitchen.

It didn't take long for Pig to start stuffing down all the food he could find- chocolates, meats, cheeses, pastries, it made no difference; all was food for Pig. He lay in glee, stroking his fat belly as he pushed the contents of the fridge into his mouth, breathing heavily as he finished off all of it. As he lay there...

he spotted another fridge, full of all the food that the animals on the farm were meant to get. Pig's belly suddenly growled loudly, full as he was, he couldn't pass up an opportunity for more food. "I doubt the other animals would complain to big fat me about eating all their food," he smirked as he dragged his obese self to the fridge, opening it and digging in happily. Pig's hunger seemed to know no bounds as he continued to devour every last morsel of food in the fridge, his stomach incredibly full and distended.

As he finally finished the food off, pig began to doze off into a food-induced slumber. In his napping, he had a dream. He had a dream of himself, waddling through the barnyard, belly dragging on the floor, other animals coming to offer him food, pig taking both them AND the food into his wanting gut- he was unstoppably fat! He even had the farmer and his family taken care of, running the whole farm all to produce food for him.

Pig stirred awake, disappointed that it had only been a dream. His now larger belly had digested all the food, and he got the idea to go and weigh himself, curious how much he had put on to his already fat frame.

Pig reached the animal scale out in the barn...

Pig approached the barn, having trouble squeezing himself through the mostly-shut door, finally managing to get all of his flabby self in. He could smell cow in the air, so he stayed on the lookout for a potential new meal. As he stepped about carefully, he heard a noise to his right. He turned his head, finding nothing. He shrugged and stepped onto the scale.

The obese pig groaned as he soon realized that he could not see the weight on the scale- his belly was far too big and in the way! Just as he came to this realization, a familiar face stepped out from the shadows. "Here, Pig, let me help you with that," it said, pig unable to believe his eyes. Looking him up and down was the obese form of Otis, his first meal! "Otis?! How are you... I ate you," he exclaimed, pointing at him and gasping, falling back and looking frightened. "A..a ghost...," he asked, terrified. "No, no Pig, I was respawned," Otis exclaimed, his large belly shaking with his excitement. Pig was a tad relieved that it was Otis, he one willing meal, who had found him, sighing and struggling to get up. Otis helped him, laughing a little. "Apparently everyone you eat comes back... I'm not too sure why, but hey, more food for a growing pig, right," he asked. "Yeah... more food... so what about you? Maybe I should just eat you now," Pig exclaimed hungrily, his large belly growling. Otis shook his head no vigorously. "No, Pig, I want to help you get bigger!! I'll bring you prey, and fatten myself up for you," he said, nodding. Pig groaned and put his hoof to his head. "Fine, fine... but I get to eat you whenever I'm hungry enough... you'll just come back anyway I suppose," he said, stepping back onto the scale. One morning on the farm, Freddy was hanging with Peck and the others where Otis had this idea about shooting a movie about alien cows that come down from Earth to pollute the Earth with their space milk. Everyone then got interested, except for Bessy, who said Otis had the imagination of a doofus on crack. Otis took that offensively, but shrugged it off.

As he passed out parts for the film, Freddy yelled, "Hooray! I'm going to be the mayor of Otisburg." "Actually, Freddy, that's my part." said Pig. "Oh okay, then I'm going to be the hero who beats the aliens." he spoke again. "Uh, dude, that's my part." said Pip. "Well, am I going to be the beautiful distress in distress?" he asked. "Sorry, Freddy, part's taken." said Abby. "Oh, is there a part for me?" he asked sadly. "Well, I haven't thought of it yet." said Otis, "Don't worry, I'll make sure you get a great part, Freddy." "Well, if anyone needs me, I'll be over there, by that tree." he said sadly as he walked toward the tree. "Poor Freddy." said Abby, "Otis, why didn't you give him a part?" "Hey, I'm a director/screenwriter/producer. It's not my job to enlist people." "Otis, Freddy's our pal. He needs to have a great part." said Peck. "Yeah you're right. I'll enlist him...when we're done shooting. Places people!" he said on a bull-horn.

Sitting sadly as he watched his friends having fun shooting the film, Freddy said, "It isn't fair. I could be an alien cow bent on Earth's Annihilation or some pretty lady in terrible danger. Licking his chops while entering the barn, Freddy looks around for the chicks, too find - nothing. First, wondering if they were playing tricks on him, he looked around - "peek a boo - I see you!" checking every corner, every haystack, every nook and cranny. Looking in the corner of the barn, Freddy did see a sizable hole in the wall, which he reached through, grabbing onto something, and pulled it through.

It was a rat, about the size Freddy used to be, with what looked like a giant butt sticking out of its mouth. A few quick swallows, and that giant butt entered its mouth, and went down its throat. The rat turned towards Freddy, and said "you know, it's not nice to interrupt others while they're eating. Which..." it pointed at Freddy's gut, "it looks as if you haven't quite been interrupted yourself."

"Sorry," said Freddy. "Been looking for some friends that came through this way. You seen a few dozen chicks?" "Chicks? No, " he said, slowly backing towards his hole. Freddy, stomach grumbling, asked the rat "is there something in there you don't want me to see?" "Well, err...no, they did come in...but now, they're gone."

"Gone?"

"Yep," said the rat, pointing at its own distended belly. "Finders, keepers, you know. If I had found that rabbit first, it would've been different, but a fellas got to eat!"

"Yeah," said Freddy, with a frown on his face. "I was looking forward to them, but now..."

At that moment, Etta strutted into the barn. "Freddy - how're they?" The rat quickly stepped back, trying to cover the yellow feathers. Etta saw it, and screamed, "NO! MY BABIES!" She charged towards the rat, unable to run due to its girth - around the size of a soccer ball - which turned to her, jaws wide open, hoping she'd become dessert. The chicks, still alive inside of the rat, heard their mother, and began crying "Mom! MOM!" She stopped, frozen in shock, giving the rat the only moment he'd need, grabbing the hen by her neck, and forcing her head quickly into its mouth. Freddy, watching this, was almost as excited by watching as he was by actually eating something!

Feet scurrying backwards, desperately trying to pull herself out of the rat, Etta began to tire. The rat - now with the shape of Etta's head forming in its throat - seemed tired itself. Freddy, realizing the opportunity afforded him, called out "No! No one eats Etta!" The rat rolled it's eyes towards Freddy, as if to say, "Stop me."

Freddy, walking around the exhausted and immobile rodent, added "Except me." He lifted the rat by its haunches, pulling the fat rodent into his mouth. Grabbing it by its shoulders and pulling, he slowly managed to work it into his mouth, Ettas lower body still protruding from its mouth, legs still kicking. Freddy felt the chicks and rabbit still squirming, still calling for help, from within the rodent. He felt Etta stil fighting within it, and the feeling was unlike anything he had ever dreamed of.

The rat itself would've been a great meal, but with Etta? Freddy swallowed powerfully, dragging the rat and his friend further into his own throat. His lips, now around Etta's waist, his tongue, tasting the greatest thing he had ever eaten. He swallowed again, watching her waist dissapear into his mouth, feeling the rat moving inside. One more swallow, and the rat, and Etta, were gone.

Freddy sat back in the barn, more stuffed than he had ever been - and now, even hungrier.
